description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the Microsoft QUIC denial of service vulnerability (CVE-2024-26190):

1. Download and apply the appropriate updates based on your Windows version:
   - For Windows 11 Version 23H2: KB5035853
   - For Windows 11 Version 22H2: KB5035853
   - For Windows 11 Version 21H2: KB5035854

2. Access the update packages directly through the links below:
   - Windows 11 Version 23H2: [Download KB5035853](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5035853)
   - Windows 11 Version 22H2: [Download KB5035853](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5035853)
   - Windows 11 Version 21H2: [Download KB5035854](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5035854)

**Details**:
This fix addresses the denial of service vulnerability in the Microsoft QUIC protocol. The updates are critical to ensure system security and functionality, as they resolve issues that could allow an attacker to negatively impact system availability.

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure your system is on the specified Windows version before proceeding with installation.
- Backup any critical data before applying system updates.
